resources.string: Hey buddy, I\'m not smart enough to answer that. Why don\'t you type help and see what magic I can actually perform.
Hi Buddy, nice to meet you. Type \"Help\" if you want to know all that I can do.

Here is a list of all the commands I know.
 
• Time - I'll tell you the current date and time 
• History - I'll list down your last 5 inputs 
• Clear - I'll clear the history for you 
• Open [URL] - I'll open the URL in the browser 
• Play [URL] - I'll play the YouTube video 
• MySongIs [URL] - I'll store your favourite song and you can play it anytime 
• Play / PlayMySong - I'll play your favourite song 
• SaveNote [Booklet] [Note] - Store a note to a booklet 
• FetchNotes [Booklet] - Fetch all notes from specific Booklet 
• FetchAllNotes - Fetch all booklets and their first notes
You forget to provide a URL.
I\'ve saved your favourite song. You can open it anytime by typing Play or PlayMySong.
You haven\'t stored any favourite song yet. Store it by typing MySongIs [URL]
Looks like you\'re new here. Or wait, did you just clear your history? Anyhow, feel free to send me a \'Help\' message, and I\'ll tell you all that I can do.
